projects.name: LAB 2
projects.description: This is the second lab in the Introduction to IT and Web Science class. It is a simple website designed to show off my resume

projects.name: LAB 4
projects.description: This lab was all about RSS and XML. I created a political RSS and Atom feed using multiple different publications based on current events.

links.text: Click Here to view the RSS feed
Click Here to view the Atom feed

projects.name: LAB 5
projects.description: In this lab we begin using javascript to validate and make a form more user friendly!

projects.name: LAB 6
projects.description: In this lab we begin using jquery to make our website more interactive!

projects.name: LAB 7
projects.description: In this lab we did the mockups for our team project. Click to see the mockup we did!

projects.name: LAB 8
projects.description: In this lab we used XAMPP to host our website locally. This allows us to make requests and run server side code. We also did some XSS.
